programme.title: UFOs: The Lost Evidence
programme.desc: Extraterrestrials and Sacred Sites: Startling evidence suggests contact with interstellar travelers in the distant past may have influenced mankind and many of our sacred sites. (S2, ep 4)

programme.title: Paranormal: Caught On Camera: Top 100
programme.desc: ...Camera - Top 100. A collection of standout videos from season one, showcasing the most chilling and unexplainable paranormal activity footage captured by eyewitnesses. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: High Roller: Les hands out his biggest loan ever on a luxurious Rolls Royce. Will this latest gamble pay off or will another shady transaction leave Les's ego in tatters? (S13, ep 2)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Giorgio Tsoukalos takes a look back at the incredible hieroglyphs, petroglyphs, and geoglyphs that he believes tell a worldwide story of alien visitation.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Giorgio Tsoukalos takes a look back at the most compelling investigations of all, and events that he believes represent real encounters with extraterrestrial visitors.

programme.title: Dickinson's Real Deal
programme.desc: Join antiques expert and presenter David Dickinson as more collectors try to sell their items to dealers. Will they strike a deal or take a chance at auction instead? (S8, ep 5)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Miss Direction... If You're Nasty: Brandi shows up in Riverside, dressed to distract. Meanwhile, Rene bites off more than even he can chew. (S13, ep 21)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: She Sure Has a Type: A small animal catches Lisa off guard, while Ivy and Isaiah barrel their way through a unit, leaving them in need of a drink. (S1, ep 22)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The Devil Buys Used Prada: Kenny tried to bribe the competition in Canyon Country, Ivy and Isaiah make the most of a purchase and Brandi takes on the power of darkness. (S13, ep 23)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Cash is King: Rene goes head-to-head with Darrell, while Lisa and her dog sneak their way into a locker that earns her stamp of approval. (S13, ep 24)

programme.title: Swamp People
programme.desc: Rolling with the Punches: Willie battles an old enemy, while Daniel and Big T use a special bait. Ashley lets Ronnie in on a clever trick. (S10, ep 13)

programme.title: Swamp People
programme.desc: Tag Out or Die Trying: RJ and Jay Paul tackle a huge problem. Joey and Zak look for giant monsters on sacred ground. (S10, ep 14)

programme.title: Swamp People
programme.desc: Voodoo Python: Gator season is over, but when snake invasion threatens the community, Troy is on hand with a little help from his friends. (S10, ep 15)

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Bigfoot Revealed: For 54 years, the Patterson-Gimlin bigfoot film has been the best proof the creature exists. Now with AI technology, the figure is clearer than ever. (S2, ep 12)

programme.title: Airport Security USA
programme.desc: Passengers are searched for illegal objects when entering and leaving the United States by the Department of Homeland Security's Customs and Border Protection officers. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: Mega Disasters 3
programme.desc: Noah's Great Flood: Could the biblical story of Noah be true? When oceans surged 8,000 years ago, water burst through the Bosporus Strait with catastrophic effects. (S3, ep 3)

programme.title: Mega Disasters 3
programme.desc: Volcanic Winter: When the largest volcanic eruption of the past two million years occurred 75,000 years ago, a shield of debris formed and deflected the sun's rays. (S3, ep 5)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Secrets of the Star Ancestors: Explore the stories of the Star Ancestors - powerful beings embedded in the traditions of native people across North America that still exist. (S14, ep 6)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Alien Air Force: Since 2017, the Navy has been releasing photos and videos of UFOs. Theorists suggest the images are nearly identical to accounts from centuries ago. (S14, ep 7)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Decoding the Dragon Gods: A look at the fire-breathing dragons, appearing in tales throughout the ancient world and worshipped as the bringers of great knowledge. (S14, ep 9)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: The Time Benders: As more people open their minds to UFOs and extraterrestrial visits from lightyears away, this episode explores whether aliens can bend both time and space. (S14, ep 10)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: On Location - Incredible Structures: Investigate 75 million years of credible evidence suggesting aliens have visited Earth. From cave drawings to phenomena in the skies. (S14, ep 11)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Giorgio Tsoukalos takes a look back at the most extraordinary encounters that, as far as he's concerned, provide evidence of an extraterrestrial presence on Earth.

programme.title: New: The Lost City Of Ramses II
programme.desc: Henning Franzmeier and his team of archaeologists undertake excavations in Pi-Ramses, hoping to discover the truth about the ancient Egyptian pharaoh Ramses II's lost city. (1 of 2)

programme.title: New: The Lost City Of Ramses II
programme.desc: Henning Franzmeier and his team of archaeologists continue their search for the truth about Ramses the Great's lost city, uncovering new secrets and fascinating finds. (2 of 2)

programme.title: Strange Evidence
programme.desc: An underwater ROV on a routine inspection films a mystifying monster from the deep. A thunderous explosion rocks a city street in Ukraine. (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Strange Evidence
programme.desc: A 60-foot wide object smashes through the upper atmosphere at 40,000mph. A creature is filmed lurking in the shadows where livestock turn up dead. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: Dog Patrol
programme.desc: Sam and Arlo chase down a group scarpering school vandals, while customs drug dog Zion busts a package wide open. (S11, ep 1)

programme.title: Dog Patrol
programme.desc: Cash-and-drug seeking star Yarra rolls on a few finds, while Rotorua police team Luke and Skudder hit the trail after a disappearing speed demon. (S11, ep 2)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Shakedown!: A hustler tries to make Les an offer he can't refuse, but the Golds fight back and turn the tables on the shady customer. (S12, ep 6)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Along Came a Spider: Ashley pranks Seth to teach him a lesson about locking his door, but Seth evens the score with a practical joke of his own. (S12, ep 7)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Inside Job: When the Golds uncover a series of bogus pawns, their investigation leads to a trusted employee and a confession. (S12, ep 8)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: The Hot Rod: Les and Seth visit a customer with a garage full of amazing vintage cars. Against his kids' wishes, Les offers big money for one of the seller's golden oldies. (S12, ep 9)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Ashley in Charge: With Les and Seth away at the Autorama car show - and Ashley in charge of the store - the employees go a little crazy. (S12, ep 10)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Karen in the Middle: Karen tries to make peace between Seth and Ashley, Bobby J takes a two-storey tractor for a spin and a watch snob riles Seth. (S12, ep 11)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Million Dollar Deal Part 1: A ventriloquist leaves Karen and Bobby J speechless, while an angry mixed martial arts fighter takes a swing at Byron. (S12, ep 12)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Million Dollar Deal Part 2: The Golds' million dollar art deal takes more twists and turns, but eventually, Les shakes hands on the single biggest purchase in store history. (S12, ep 13)

programme.title: Container Wars
programme.desc: Surf's Up: A surprise item may send the Israelis in search of major dollars. Jason strikes on a container full of wood and weird gear. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: Container Wars
programme.desc: The Big Not-So-Easy: Items from New Orleans stimulate a frenzy of bidding, while a refrigerated unit sends chills down bidders' spines. (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: Container Wars
programme.desc: New Blood: A new team surface and pose a threat to Mo, a three-wheeled item entices Matthew and a cluster of table-tennis balls cause confusion. (S2, ep 9)

programme.title: Container Wars
programme.desc: Bigger is Better: Buyers clash over outdoor BBQs and a portable rave unit. Mo and Ty take a big gamble on a speedy prize. (S2, ep 10)

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There:...

programme.title: Alien Files Unsealed

programme.title: Alien Files Unsealed

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Frankie doesn't want Watzie to leave for dragon migration in 'What's Up Watzie?', and in 'So Familiar', Draculaura must discover her familiar to open a Witchcraft Codex and hone her powers. (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Frankie doesn't make the fearleading team in 'Crushed', and then in 'Over Bro-tective', Clawd learns that being a good, older brother means more than just protecting his sister. (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Going Wonkers: A comet makes the Thundermans' powers go wonky just as Phoebe's crush asks her to a dance. It'll be fine if Phoebe and Max stick together, but neither wants that! (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Restaurant Crashers: When the kids accidentally wreck Barb's anniversary gift, they have to enlist superhero sidekick Blobbin's help to fix it and stall their parents. (S1, ep 11)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Too Much Game: A new student, Shawn, takes Henry's spot on the basketball team, but Henry suspects he may be older than he claims. Captain Man needs the help of an old friend. (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry the Man-Beast: Henry's got a big date, but things don't go quite as planned after he's accidentally exposed to a strange device in the Man Cave. (S1, ep 11)

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: Rinus: Max & Tess track the mysterious Rinus through Amsterdam and discover a cryptic notebook. Back at the Hunter house the other kids make a mess while trying to cheer themselves up. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Scaredy and Hefty disguise themselves as girls in 'Some Like It Not', then in 'Joke's on You', Vanity tires of Jokey's exploding box and decides to boobytrap it with an even bigger boom. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Smurf, Yes Smurf!: While Papa Smurf is away, Brainy uses a potion to finally get the Village to obey his every whim. (S2, ep 3b)

programme.title: Best & Bester
programme.desc: Best is too anxious to sleep in 'Rock-a-Bye Besty', then in 'Shake or Break', The twins help Flip Flop with her milkshake deliveries, but find one difficult customer impossible to satisfy. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Mr Krabs gets trapped in Bikini Bottom's brand-new bank in 'Safe Deposit Krabs', and then in 'Plankton's Pet', Plankton gets a pet to cheer himself up.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob, You're Fired!: In order to save money, Mr. Krabs fires SpongeBob. Unable to just "do nothing", SpongeBob decides to go back to work doing anything, anywhere.

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: Craig Mammalton learns what it's like to not be the best at something in 'Eye of the Hotdog', then in 'Patrick Takes the Cake', Patrick and a cake hide out in the wilderness. (S1, ep 24)

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: Plankton discovers competition in Narlene's backwoods restaurant in 'Taste of Defeat', then in 'Scaredy Squirrel', Sandy spends a night at the Trawler cabin. (S1, ep 25)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Brothers of Dagarack: Simon falls ill and asks Alvin and Theodore not to see a new movie without him, but Alvin just can't resist.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Opposites Attract: When an invention of Simon's accidently gets knocked over it magnetizes Alvin and Simon making them inseparable

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Theodore's Calling: Miss Croner attempts to help Theodore discover his true calling in life. (S4, ep 2a)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Animal House Party: When Derek overhears that Alvin and his brothers are alone for the weekend, he plans a wild party at their house. (S4, ep 17a)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When Squidward is hurt on the job, he threatens to sue Mr. Krabs in 'Accidents Will Happen', and in 'The Other Patty', Mr. Krabs and Plankton find a common enemy in the new 'Flabby Patty' restaurant.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Instead of paying to fix a hole in the wall, Mr. Krabs instead opens up a 'Drive-Thru', and in 'The Hot Shot', Tony Fast Jr., the son of a famous race car driver, teaches SpongeBob how to drive.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Pearl stars in a guest appearance in 'Pearl Wants to Be a Star', then in 'Super Sitters', Patrick and SpongeBob go back in time to watch Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy when they were new. (S1, ep 12)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick messes with the space-time continuum in 'The Patterfly Effect', then in 'A Space Affair to Remember', Cecil and Bunny celebrate their anniversary in outer space. (S1, ep 18)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: The Parent Zap: After Phoebe and Max let Chloe's friends watch a horror movie and eat sweets, Jinx and Booch's parents want to meet Chloe's. So Max and Phoebe transform into Hank and Barb. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Save The Date: Max bets Phoebe she can't turn off being a superhero and go on a normal date. Chloe helps Phoebe do well on the date, but Max tries to sabotage it by crying wolf. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Captain Jerk: Captain Man attempts to boost his image by holding a contest where three winners get a tour of his secret lair. But Henry's friends are among the winners! (S1, ep 22)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: The Bucket Trap: Henry and Charlotte want to tell Jasper that Henry is really Kid Danger. They decide to give Jasper a test secret to prove he's ready. (S1, ep 23)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Patrick has a coupon for free ice cream in 'Patrick's Coupon', then in 'Out of the Picture', Mr. Krabs buys Squidward's art, but wants to make a profit on his purchase.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When a prehistoric Sponge is unfrozen, he causes chaos all over in 'Cave Dwelling Sponge', then in 'The Clam Whisperer', a flock of clams descend on Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Missing Miss Smith: When Alvin finally pushes Miss Smith too far, she quits. Unfortunately, her replacement is a nightmare. Now, Alvin has to do whatever it takes to get her back.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Addicted: The Chipettes challenge the Chipmunks to go three hours without their favourite things. How hard can it be?

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Britt's Picks: Brittany's furious when she thinks Alvin has been writing on her blog and vows to get him back, but was it Alvin?

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Time Capsule: When the school digs up an old high school time capsule, Miss Smith and Dave work together to keep an old secret. (S4, ep 8b)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show

programme.desc: Bear Spread: Grizzy is frustrated: just as he was about to coat a nice big fresh salmon with chocolate spread and snuggle up in front of the TV, he discovers that the pantry is empty! (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Cellular Bear: Grizzy's nap is interrupted by the forest ranger's cell phone. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Extreme Fitness: In order to woo the she-bear he's infatuated with, Grizzy decides to take things in hand and get into shape with the ranger's bodybuilding equipment. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.desc: As Far as Bear Can Remember: An old metal box found by chance brings back childhood memories for Grizzy and the Lemmings. They recall the first time they met, when they were still kids. (S1 Ep55)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Chemical Lemmings: How can Grizzy watch a documentary on salmon fish, nice and comfy on the sofa, when the Lemmings are playing chemistry novices with a fun experiment box? (S1 Ep56)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Remote Control: Grizzy's TV remote control is stolen by a partridge who collects high-tech objects in his nest perched high up in a tree. (S1 Ep57)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Breaking Bite: Beth becomes the big dog on campus after she bites Duncan, but being the big dog is a dangerous thing, especially when you didn't actually bite anybody! (S3 Ep9)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: I Dream of Meanie: When Cody keeps screaming in his sleep, Gwen and Duncan take a trip into Cody's dreams to see what is scaring him. (S3 Ep10)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Squirrels Squirrels Squirrels: Courtney's attempt to make Chef a better teacher fails when a squirrel gets his hands on her mind-control device. (S3 Ep11)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Say Hello to My Little Friends: After telling the kids he will not miss them over the long weekend, Chef locks himself into the school and finds out he was very, very wrong. (S3 Ep12)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: WaterHose-Five: It's the hottest day of the year and a broken air conditioner leads to a water battle of epic proportions to determine who controls the garden hose. (S3 Ep13)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Cody the Barbarian: Cody is set to inherit a video game empire from his long lost uncle, but only if he and his friends have what it takes to conquer a fantastical live action video game. (S3 Ep14)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: TP2: Judgement Bidet: When the city experiences a toilet paper shortage, Beth and Harold investigate and discover it's their old rival Sewer Mike who is the mastermind behind it all. (S3 Ep15)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dial B for Birder: Harold uncovers a secret plot that Chef's new parrot is hatching and tries to save his teacher, only to discover that Sugar figured it out before him. Or did she? (S3 Ep16)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: No Entrance!: As usual, Grizzy picks the door of the ranger's log cabin to go in and make himself comfortable, but this time it's impossible to enter! (S1 Ep49)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemmings Indigestion: The Lemmings have got their hands on a pack of white beans which have very strange properties: when mixed with soda, anyone who eats them turns into a bouncing ball. (S1 Ep50)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Sonata in Bear Major: Grizzy wants to get rid of the old piano in the garage at any cost, for the Lemmings love using it to make a racket. (S1 Ep51)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Fractions: The Lemmings find a crate from an army convoy transporting ultra-secret material that divides objects into multiple miniaturised versions of themselves. (S1 Ep52)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Bear that Laid Golden Eggs: Near the supermarket, a machine hands out surprise eggs in exchange for a coin. Amongst the lots to be won, there is a super firework rocket. (S1 Ep53)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Crash Training Course: Grizzy finds a gadget that enables you to learn anything. He can now become the perfect bear! But first, he needs to learn how to get rid of the Lemmings. (S1 Ep54)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: As Far as Bear Can Remember: An old metal box found by chance brings back childhood memories for Grizzy and the Lemmings. They recall the first time they met, when they were still kids. (S1 Ep55)

programme.desc: Remote Control: Grizzy's TV remote control is stolen by a partridge who collects high-tech objects in his nest perched high up in a tree. (S1 Ep57)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Simply Perfect: When the kids are about to be subject to school testing with no time to study, Courtney freaks and orders a Brainiac Ray from the back of a comic book. (S2 Ep34)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Ghoul Spirit: Gwen rejects the friendship of a friendly ghost. (S2 Ep35)

programme.title: Mermicorno: Starfall
programme.desc: Mission: Mermicorno: Astra, a winged unicorn mermaid known as a Mermicorno, sets out on an adventure to find her missing sister. (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: Unicorn Academy
programme.desc: Unicorn Academy - Part 2: At Unicorn Academy, regular teen Sophia has a lot to learn about fantastical creatures, but a dark force threatens to return and destroy unicorn magic! (Ep2)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: Gone With The Wand: Felicity and friends find a magic wand, which they use to make crazy wishes until they can locate the wand's rightful owner. (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: Fountain Of Too Much Youth: When Miguel discovers his favourite malt is now on the kids menu, he drinks from the Fountain of Youth to get younger. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Cartoon Realism: Gwen is frustrated by Beth's silly belief that cartoons are real, but they visit an animation studio and discover that Beth is right! (S2 Ep31)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Oww: When the kids discover Chef's past as a disgraced pro wrestler, they invite his old tag team partner to help put on a charity show. But is the big match about reunion or revenge?! (S2 Ep32)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Jelly Aches: The school descends into chaos after getting a visit from Gazunga, the Jealousy Troll. (S2 Ep33)

programme.title: Mermicorno: Starfall
programme.desc: Entrenched: To get information on Pearl Girl, Astra strikes a risky deal with a powerful fish, but the outcome is more than she bargained for. (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: New: Unicorn Academy
programme.desc: Unicorn Academy - Part 3: At Unicorn Academy, regular teen Sophia has a lot to learn about fantastical creatures, but a dark force threatens to return and destroy unicorn magic! (Ep3)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: He Who Wears The Clown: After trying on the nose of a clown, Owen learns that this is how clowns are made. He's stuck as a clown until he can trick someone into asking to try on the nose. (S2 Ep20)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Us 'r' Toys: Chef brings in some old toys from his childhood and he, Duncan and Gwen get magically sucked into the toys and need to find a way to get back into their own bodies. (S2 Ep21)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dream Worriers: Izzy forgets the ending to her most amazing dream of all time, so the kids travel into her mind to find out what happened. (S2 Ep22)

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindiau

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Sut mae Anni'n bwriadu cael gwared ar y bananas ych a fi mae Mam-Gu wedi roi yn ei bocs bwyd? How will Anni get rid of the yucky bananas that Mam-gu's put in her lunchbox?

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Guto Gwningen a'i ffrindiau. The animated tales of a little bunny and his friends.

programme.title: Help Llaw

programme.title: Sali Mali
programme.desc: Ar ddamwain, mae Jac Do'n torri fâs Sali Mali wrth chwarae pêl-droed yn y ty! Jac Do accidentally breaks Sali Mali's vase whilst playing football indoors!

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae Pablo eisiau edrych o gwmpas y siop deganau - mae'r teganau i gyd yn hwylio i fynd i'r gwely am fod y siop ar fîn cau. Pablo enjoys looking around the toy shop but it's about to close!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Y tro hwn: Seland Newydd. Yma byddwn ni'n ymweld â'r brifddinas Wellington, yn dysgu am y bobl Maori, ac yn edrych ar symbolau cenedlaethol fel yr aderyn ciwi. We take a trip to New Zealand.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Tydi Jetboi na Jetferch ddim yn cymryd hen jet eu rhieni o ddifri: nes i Peredur greu helynt gyda'i ddyfais clogyn newydd. Neither Jet-boy nor Jet-girl take their parents' old jet seriously!

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Bronllwyn sy'n ymuno â Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau llwigar! Teams from Ysgol Bronllwyn join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: New: Stwnsh Sadwrn Byw
programme.desc: Jack, Leah, Lloyd, Jed a Cadi sy' yn stiwdio Stwnsh Sadwrn gyda llond lle o gemau, LOL-ian ac ambell pei Stwnsh! Jack, Leah, Lloyd, Jed and Cadi are in the Stwnsh Sadwrn studio for more fun.

programme.title: Y 'Sgubor Flodau
programme.desc: Ffoaduriaid o'r Wcrain sy'n diolch i staff Gwersyll yr Urdd Llangrannog am eu cymorth wrth iddynt ymgartrefu yng Nghymru dros dro. This time, Ukrainian refugees say thank you with flowers. [SL]

programme.title: Dim Byd i Wisgo
programme.desc: Olive ac Elin, mam-gu ac wyres, sy'n cael help Cadi ac Owain yn y stiwdio steilio heddiw. A dynamic gran and granddaughter duo look for outfits that have a wow factor for a family wedding. [SL]

programme.title: Codi Pac
programme.desc: Geraint Hardy sydd yn 'Codi Pac' ac yn ymlwybro o gwmpas Cymru, a thref lan môr Dinbych-y-Pysgod sy'n serennu yr wythnos hon. This week we discover what the town of Tenby has to offer. [SL]

programme.title: Richard Holt: Yr Academi Felys
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae Richard wedi dod a'r pobyddion i ardd Bodnant i osod y sialens felys nesa. From striking floral displays to beautiful desserts, the bakers learn about the power of presentation. [SL]

programme.title: Cais Quinnell
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, mae Scott yn rhoi cynnig ar yodlo hefo Ieuan Jones, ac yn ceufadu ar yr afon Tâf yng ngwmni Rhys Pinner. This week, Scott Quinnell and Mel Owen give some pigs a spa experience! [SL]

programme.title: Caernarfon v CA Pen-y-bont
programme.desc: Rownd Terfynol Cwpan Adran 1: Caernarfon v Clwb Athletig Pen-y-bont. C/G 13:00. Stadiwm Principality. Division 1 Cup Final: Caernarfon v Bridgend Athletic Club. K/O 13:00. EC available.

programme.title: Canu Gyda Fy Arwr: Ian 'H' Watkins

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae un ellygen glaw hyfryd ar ôl ar y goeden. Tybed pwy gaiff ei bwyta? There's one lone rainpear on the tree. Who will get to eat it?

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Newyddion i blant hyd at 6 oed fydd yn diddannu ac yn eu dysgu am y byd o'u cwmpas, yn ei holl amrywiaeth. News for children up to 6 years old, to entertain and educate them about the world.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Yng ngardd y parc mae'r Capten yn dyfrio'r pridd i Seren blannu hadau. Ond pa flodyn sydd wedi tyfu yno'n barod? In the park, the Captain is watering the soil so Seren can plant some seeds.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Betsan eisiau gwybod mwy am asparagws, felly mae Hywel y ffermwr hud yn ei thywys i Fferm Fach i ddangos iddi sut mae'n cael ei dyfu. Betsan wants to discover more about asparagus!

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'n ddiwrnod chwaraeon Pentre Papur Pop! On today's poptastic adventure, it's a Pop Paper City sports day! Mai-Mai is the sports day judge!

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Yn rhaglen heddiw, mae Ceris yn holi, 'Pam bod enwau gyda ni?' Mae Tad-cu'n sôn am amser pan taw Ceri oedd enw pawb yn y byd! In today's programme, Ceris asks 'Why do we have names?'.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Ai caws yw'r lleuad? Gall Odo a Dwdl fynd I'r lleuad a dod nol a darn I bawb yn y Gwersyll? Cawn weld. Odo figures out a way to go to the moon and bring a piece back for his friends.

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Meleri a'r criw yn ymweld a Chastell Henllys. Gwri, Syfi and Esli walk part of the Wales Coast Path, and Huw meets younger members of Caernarfon girls football team.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae Nimbwl yn rhy bryderus i fynd am ei fathodyn Clwb Cymylau cyntaf. Mae Blero a'i ffrindiau'n ceisio ei helpu gyda'i nerfusrwydd. Nimbwl is too nervous to do his first Cloud Club badge.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Heddiw mae Ben Dant yn ymuno á disgyblion Ysgol Y Graig, Merthyr Tudful i greu trysor penigamp. Ben Dant is on a new adventure to recycle and turn rubbish and waste into a masterpiece.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae hi'n wyl Ganol Haf a Llwyd yw'r llywydd. Ond pan mae Llwyd yn mynd yn styc yn ty sut all yr wyl ddechrau hebddo? It's the Midsummer Festival, but something happens to badger.

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Ma'r efeillaid yn edrych ymlaen i fwyta crempog, ond ma 'na greadur bach arall sydd yn awyddus i fwyta eu brecwast, pry cop o'r enw Prys! A spider called Prys is after the twins' pancakes!

programme.title: New: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Twm Twrch heddiw? What's happening in Twm Twrch's world today?

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth, wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai as they search for a new shell for Cranc !

programme.title: New: Penblwyddi Cyw
programme.desc: Os wyt ti'n dathlu dy ben-blwydd, dyma gyfle i ti weld dy lun ar Cyw. If you're celebrating your birthday, you may be lucky enough to see your photo on today's Cyw!

programme.title: Y Cosmos
programme.desc: Sut a phryd bydd y bydysawd yn darfod? Wedi 100 mlynedd o chwilio, mae gwyddonwyr yn gallu dweud sut a phryd bydd y diwedd yn dod. Exploring how and when the universe might end.

programme.title: Y Llais
programme.desc: Pennod gyffrous wrth i ni gloi'r gyfres a darganfod pwy fydd enillydd Y Llais 2025. An exciting episode as we conclude the series and find out who will be the winner of Y Llais 2025.

programme.title: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol
programme.desc: Dathlwn Sul y Mamau yn ardal Wrecsam, efo gwledd o ganu o Gapel Bethlehem, Rhosllannerchrugog. We celebrate Mother's Day in the Wrexham area, with performances by Osian Wyn Bowen & C.Ô.R.

programme.title: Ty Ffit
programme.desc: Dim ond tri cleient sydd yn Ty Ffit y penwythnos yma, ac mae tasg goroesi arbennig yn aros. There are only three clients at Ty Ffit this weekend. Will this affect their journey of change?

programme.title: Y WAL
programme.desc: Yr olaf yn y gyfres, ac mae taith Ffion Dafis o waliau eiconig y byd yn gorffen gyda hanes cwymp Wal Berlin. Last in series, and Ffion Dafis's tour of iconic walls ends with the Berlin Wall.

programme.title: Pen Llyn Harri Parri
programme.desc: Cyfle i grwydro Pen Llyn yng nghwmni Harri Parri wrth iddo deithio drwy fro ei febyd. Author and minister Harri Parri introduces viewers to the Llyn Peninsula as he explores the area.

programme.title: Cefn Gwlad
programme.desc: Cwrddwn ag Islwyn Rees, ffermwr o gwm Clywedog sydd wedi wynebu sawl her, gan gynnwys colli tir ffrwythlon pan foddwyd y cwm yn y 60au. We meet lifelong farmer Islwyn from Clywedog Valley.

programme.title: Pêl-droed: Cymru v Denmarc
programme.desc: Uchafbwyntiau gêm Cynghrair y Merched UEFA gyda Cymru yn erbyn Denmarc, Stadiwm Dinas Caerdydd. Highlights of the UEFA Women's Nations League fixture: Wales v Denmark. Cardiff City Stadium.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm Omnibws
programme.desc: Rhifyn omnibws yn edrych nôl ar ddigwyddiadau yng Nghwmderi dros yr wythnos ddiwethaf. Omnibus edition looking back at events in Cwmderi over the past week. With on-screen English subtitles.

programme.title: Clwb Rygbi: Gweilch v Scarlets
programme.desc: Gêm fyw Cwpan Her EPCR rhwng y Gweilch a'r Scarlets. Stadiwm Swansea.com. C/G 17.30. EPCR Challenge Cup live game between the Ospreys and Scarlets. Swansea.com Stadium. K/O 17.30.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: New: Cynefin
programme.desc: Mae Heledd Cynwal, Iestyn Jones a Llinos Owen yn croesi môr Iwerddon i grwydro Dulyn, gan ddathlu'r cysylltiadau gyda Chymru. We explore Dublin and the longstanding connections with Wales.

programme.title: Byd Eithafol Neo-Nazis yn Ein Plith
programme.desc: Y newyddiadurwr Maxine Hughes sy'n ymchwilio i'r bechgyn Cymraeg sy'n cael eu radicaleiddio gan neo-Nazis. We look into the number of teenage boys being groomed and radicalised by neo-Nazis.

programme.title: Gogglebocs Cymru
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Tudur Owen a'i ffrindiau - hen a newydd - i chwerthin a chrio a dadlau dros deledu'r wythnos o Gymru a thu hwnt. Gogglebocs Cymru is back on the sofa!

programme.title: Welsh Whisperer: Ni'n Teithio Nawr
programme.desc: Ym mhennod dau, mae'r Welsh Whisperer yn teithio i Sarn Mellteyrn, Pen Llyn, i gwrdd â chymeriadau lleol. In episode two, the Welsh Whisperer travels to Sarn Mellteyrn to meet locals.

programme.title: The Claim
programme.desc: 2000. Romance. Director: Michael Winterbottom. Stars Peter Mullan, Milla Jovovich & Wes Bentley. A man who sold his wife and daughter to get ahead in business has his past come back to haunt him. [S]

programme.title: Midnight Fear
programme.desc: 1990. Crime thriller directed by Bill Crain and starring David Carradine, Pete Atkins and Mark Carlton. Detective Hanks must track down two psychotic killers before they kill again. [S]

programme.title: Kill Her Gently
programme.desc: 1957. Thriller. Directed by Charles Saunders. Stars Griffith Jones, Maureen Connell & Marc Lawrence. Two convicts who escape prison are picked up by a motorist who helps them on the run. [S]

programme.title: Time To Remember
programme.desc: The Time of Three Kings. 1964. Narrated by Sir Michael Redgrave. It's 1936, Edward VIII becomes King, the Olympic Games are in Germany, there's war in Spain, then George VI becomes the new King. [S]

programme.title: Dick Tracy (1937)
programme.desc: 1937. Thriller. Directors: Alan James & Ray Taylor. Stars Ralph Byrd, Kay Hughes & Smiley Burnette. A criminal puts the famous detective's brother under a spell and turns him against his sibling.

programme.title: Black Saddle
programme.desc: 1959. The Return. Western with Peter Breck. After his brothers are killed in a shootout, a gunfighter decides to hang up his guns and uphold the law by becoming a lawyer.

programme.title: Space Patrol
programme.desc: The Slaves of Neptune. 1963. Stars Mary Dean, Libby Morris, Ronnie Stevens. A spaceship carrying colonists to Pluto disappears. Whilst investigating this, the crew fall under a hypnotic influence. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Clock King's Crazy Crimes. 1966. Stars Adam West & Walter Slezak. The Clock King arranges for one of his trick timepieces to be sold to the Harry Hummert Jewellery Shop so he can loot it. [S]

programme.title: Richard the Lionheart
programme.desc: The Wolf of Banbury. 1962. Stars Dermot Walsh, Frances De Wolff, John Bennett. Richard learns that Baron Giles is giving protection to fugitives from justice and that he has captured Lady Rosalie. [S]

programme.title: Phantom Creeps
programme.desc: Thundering Rails. 1939. Stars Bela Lugosi, Robert Kent & Edwin Stanley. Dr Zorka is determined to recover his meteorite from the agents. [S]

programme.title: Runaway Railway
programme.desc: 1965. Adventure. Directed by Jan Darnley-Smith. Stars John Moulder-Brown, Kevin Bennett, Leonard Brockwell, Sydney Tafler & Ronnie Barker. Children foil crooks and re-open an old branch line. [S]

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: The Oath. 1960. Stars Richard Greene, Alexander Gauge & John Arnatt. The Deputy Sheriff attempts to trick Friar Tuck in order to prove that the priest colludes with the outlaws. [S]

programme.title: Phantom Planet
programme.desc: 1961. Sci-fi. Directed by William Marshall. Stars Dean Fredericks, Coleen Gray & Anthony Dexter. An astronaut discovers a population of tiny beings living on an invisible asteroid. [S]

programme.title: One Step Beyond
programme.desc: Epilogue. 1959. Starring Julie Adams, Charles Herbert and Charles Aidman. A recovering alcoholic is pushed to his limits when his family is trapped in a collapsed mine. [S]

programme.title: Dick Barton: Special Agent
programme.desc: 1979. Writer: Clive Exton. Dick's Aunt (Stella Kemball) tells him that her house has vanished. Richard Marley reveals that Harold Jenkins (Peter Godfrey) has perfected his ultimate weapon.

programme.title: Fireball XL-5
programme.desc: The Forbidden Planet. 1963. Stars David Graham, John Bluthal & Paul Maxwell. Whilst working on a space station, Prof. Matic and Dr. Stamp are kidnapped by angry residents of the planet Nutopia.

programme.title: Captain Scarlet and the Mysterons
programme.desc: Point 783. 1967. Stars Elizabeth Morgan, Paul Maxwell & Francis Matthews. Scarlet and Blue are assigned to escort the Supreme Commander to SHEF HQ after the Mysterons threaten his life.

programme.title: Hobson's Choice
programme.desc: 1954. Drama. Director: David Lean. Stars Charles Laughton, John Mills & Brenda de Banzie. Henry Hobson's three daughters want to marry, but he refuses as traditions require him to pay settlements. [S]

programme.title: The Ghost of Rashmon Hall
programme.desc: 1948. Horror. Directed by Denis Kavanagh. Stars Valentine Dyall, Anne Howard, Alec Faversham & Howard Douglas. A doctor is summoned to an old, dark manor to clear the house of evil spirits. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Hot History
programme.desc: 1968. A brilliant look at the work of the Press Association with its teleprinters and fast movement to get the news out.

programme.title: Z-Cars
programme.desc: Kidnap. 1976. Stars Ralph Arliss, Bruce Boa, Don Fellows, James Ellis, Douglas Fielding, Garrick Hagon & Mark Jones. A rag week kidnap for charity starts out all right... [S]

programme.title: A Family At War
programme.desc: The War Office Regrets. Created by John Finch. Stars Colin Douglas & Shelagh Fraser. Mystery hangs over the fate of John Porter. Whilst on leave David is forced to face up to his actions. [S]

programme.title: North West Frontier
programme.desc: 1959. Drama. Director: J. Lee Thompson. Stars Kenneth More, Lauren Bacall & Herbert Lom. In British India, a prince must be taken to safety across a rebel-held territory. [S]

programme.title: Villain (1971)
programme.desc: 1971. Drama. Director: Michael Tuchner. Stars Richard Burton, Ian McShane & Nigel Davenport. Your everyday London businessman and sadistic gang leader. Once you've met, you'll wish you hadn't. [S]

programme.title: Villain (1971)
programme.desc: 1971. Drama. Director: Michael Tuchner. Stars Richard Burton, Ian McShane & Nigel Davenport. Your everyday London businessman and sadistic gang leader. Once you've met, you'll wish you hadn't. [S]

programme.title: Up The Chastity Belt
programme.desc: 1971. Comedy. Director: Bob Kellett. Stars: Frankie Howerd, Eartha Kitt, Anna Quayle, Roy Hudd. Lurkalot is a serf who sells chastity belts and love potions at the local market place. [S]

programme.title: The Vengeance of She
programme.desc: 1968. Fantasy. Directed by Cliff Owen. Stars John Richardson, Olga Schoberová & Edward Judd. A young girl is drawn to the ancient city of Kuma to succeed the lost former ruler Ayesha as empress. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Circus Painting and Fishing for Pollock. 1980. Jack Hargreaves visits his circus family friends where a travelling artist is at work, and then he goes sea fishing off the coast of Poole. [S]

programme.title: Scarlet Thread
programme.desc: 1951. Crime drama directed by Lewis Gilbert and starring Kathleen Byron, Laurence Harvey and Sydney Tafler. Two high flying crooks take part in a robbery that goes very wrong. [S]

programme.title: Dick Barton at Bay
programme.desc: 1950. Action. Director: Godfrey Grayson. Stars Don Stannard, Tamara Desni & George Ford. Dick Barton is assigned to find a kidnapped professor and deactivate a death ray before catastrophe occurs. [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed at the beginning of April. [S]

programme.title: The Big Job
programme.desc: 1965. Comedy. A gang of crooks are caught on a big job. 15 years later they find their loot is now buried under a police station. Stars Sidney James, Sylvia Syms, Dick Emery & Joan Sims. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Where Have All...
programme.desc: ... the Butterflies Gone? 1968. An enchanting look into the natural world of the butterfly and the reasons for the apparent shortage of them.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro Goes to School. 1962. Stars Buddy Ebsen, Frank Wilcox & Eleanor Audley. Jed attempts to enrol Jethro at an exclusive elementary school, but the proprietor is convinced it is a hoax. [S]

programme.title: Cinebox Memories
programme.desc: British Rock 'n' Roll icon Russ Sainty performs Go Away Little Girl in this brilliant musical short.

programme.title: Village of the Giants
programme.desc: 1965. Fantasy. Directed by Bert I. Gordon. Stars Tommy Kirk, Johnny Crawford & Beau Bridges. A group of teens grow into giants after eating a boy genius's invention and decide to terrorise a town. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Clock King's Crazy Crimes. 1966. Stars Adam West & Walter Slezak. The Clock King arranges for one of his trick timepieces to be sold to the Harry Hummert Jewellery Shop so he can loot it. [S]

programme.title: Bandido
programme.desc: 1956. Western. Directed by Richard Fleisher. Stars Robert Mitchum, Ursula Thiess & Gilbert Roland. An adventurer teams up with a rebel leader to steal an arms shipment due for government troops. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life The Sinking City
programme.desc: 1968. An intriguing look at the efforts being made to prevent Venice from sinking into the mud.

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: A Bushel of Apples. 1960. Stars Richard Greene & Harry H. Corbett. Friar Tuck learns that a Sir Watkyn is extorting wages and livestock from the serfs and turns to the church for a solution. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: The Shooting Master. 1986. Lock, stock and barrel Jack explains the working of his great-grandfather's shotgun. Then he visits a shooting school on a disused railway line. [S]

programme.title: The Footage Detectives
programme.desc: We start with a trip to Durham's beaches in the 1960s and a look at the life of a sea coal man, we keep up with the fashions and products of 1949 and boogie with the 'The Avons' in 1962. [S]

programme.title: Train of Events
programme.desc: 1949. Drama. Directed by Sidney Cole, Charles Crichton and Basil Dearden. Starring Jack Warner, Susan Shaw and Gladys Henson. A train disaster is told as four short stories. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Model Girl
programme.desc: 1969. An insight into the life of Britain's top models, with a look at the rewards of the job.

programme.title: Gideon's Way
programme.desc: The Tin God. Stars John Gregson Alexander Davion and Daphne Anderson. Two criminals make a murderous escape from prison with a carefully executed plan. [S]

programme.title: The Wheeltappers and Shunters Social Club
programme.desc: Episode 19. 1975. The Flirtations perform 'Put Your Hands Together', Joe Henderson (Mr Piano) sings 'Trudi' and 'Some of These Days' and George Melly sings 'Boogie Woogie Man'. [S]

programme.title: Budgie
programme.desc: Everybody loves a baby. Stars: Adam Faith, Iain Cuthbertson & Lynn Dalby. Budgie starts a farming business, but not one that employs a farm or animals. [S]

programme.title: Heavens Above!
programme.desc: 1963. Comedy. Directed by John & Roy Boulting. Stars Peter Sellers, Ian Carmichael, Cecil Parker & Eric Sykes. Due to mistaken identity, a minister is accidently appointed to a snobbish parish. [S]

programme.desc: Speed Limits: Things get out of hand on the playground when Cory takes over as School Safety Monitor. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Copy Car: Cory has had it up to his windshield wipers when Chrissy won't stop copying everything he says and does! (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Happy Anniversary: Things in the Carson house get a bit crazy when Cory and Chrissy help Mama with a last-minute surprise for Papa. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Mike's Carcade: Cory and Freddie compete against the Clutch Brothers in an epic video game battle of Go! Go! Dance Party. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Baddie Bots: Romeo resents the PJs' new animal powers, so he invents some robotic animal "powers" of his own. (S5 Ep7)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Newton And The Animals: Newton leads the PJ Pets on a mission to rescue the PJ Masks. (S5 Ep8)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Octobella Strikes Again: Gekko is so anxious about facing a bullying villain, that he stays home one night to avoid her. (S5 Ep9)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Octobella on the Loose: Octobella creates a powerful octopus crystal that makes her a bigger threat than ever. (S5 Ep10)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: Cactus Herbal Tea: Jean-Claude has caught a cold. Billy thinks he should protect his throat with a neckerchief, so he takes JC to see Dede Rabbit to ask if he can borrow his scarf. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: The New Sheriff: Billy finds a gift in the latest issue of The Adventures of Jessy Dog - a sheriff's badge! He fastens it to his chest and sets off in search of some bad guys to arrest. (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: Dandelion soup: After taking a swim in the river, Miss Goatie finds her stagecoach has gone missing. Impatient to see the new books in the library, the children decide to go in search of it. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: The Dream-Catcher: Billy had bad dreams during the night and slept very badly. Seeing his friend so tired, JC offers to read him a story to help him get to sleep. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Fast Friends: Blitz's patience is tested when he and Jon try to train a fast young raptor. (S2 Ep6)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: The Litterhorns: When Ike Tinhorn decides that it's easier to dispose of their garbage near Crystal Creek, it spoils the drinking water for dinosaurs downstream. (S2 Ep7)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: One Very Special Bronto: When Clover tries to be the Ranch's protector like Biscuit, he fails to notice that a T-Rex needs his help. (S2 Ep8)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Dino Ranchers- Roll!: When a T-Rex needs to be rescued, Miguel is confident that his untested new Dino Rumbler is up to the task, but Jon and Min are worried. (S2 Ep9)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Risk it for Biscuit: Out on a mission together, Jon is so keen to impress Biscuit that he causes problems by jumping too quickly into the lead rather than listening and working as a team. (S2 Ep10)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Sneaky Swipers: When things begin to disappear from Dino Ranch, Blitz and the gang discover the importance of knowing the facts before jumping to conclusions. (S1 Ep19)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Clover's Height Fright: When Pteddy gets stuck atop the Mile High Mesa, Clover must overcome his fear of heights by taking things one step at a time to help his friend. (S1 Ep20)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: The Creepy Cryosaur: When Clara Tinhorn tries to scare the Jr Ranchers during their pumpkin patch harvest, she gets a taste of her own medicine. (S2 Ep19)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Jon's Dino Detour: After making a mistake, Jon is so keen on doing a good job that he has trouble seeing that a dinosaur needs his help. (S2 Ep20)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Sleeping Beauties: Masha is the best "mommy" in the world, but even she cannot put Rosy to sleep. Bear offers a solution: a music box. However, the music box holds a surprise inside it! (S5 Ep19)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Plant: As Molang and Piu Piu are preparing a potion to cure the king's mosquito bites, they discover an adorable plant... that's also a carnivore. (S5 Ep11)
